text:
Hello.

I’ve tried to fetch a folder data from HubSpot account with hs command, `hs fetch --account=<name> <src>`, but I’ve got an error below.

By the way,  my access is `super admin`.

```［ERROR] The request for "direban-current" in account 5113336 was forbidden. This app hasn't been granted all required scopes to make this call. Read more about required scopes here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/scopes>.```
Can you kindly let me know how to fix this error ?

Thank you for your kindness in advance
